content:
I'm happy to help you with canceling your Amazon order! However, I need to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have direct access to your Amazon account or order information. To cancel an order, you'll need to contact Amazon's customer service directly.

Here's what you can do:

1. Go to Amazon.com and sign in to your account.
2. Click on "Your Orders" at the top right corner of the page.
3. Find the order you want to cancel and click on "Cancel items" next to it.
4. Follow the prompts to confirm the cancellation.

If you're unable to cancel the order online, you can contact Amazon's customer service by:

1. Clicking on "Help & Customer Service" at the top right corner of the page.
2. Selecting "Contact Us" and then "Email Us" or "Call Us".
3. Providing your order number and explanation for the cancellation.

Regarding your frequent purchases, it's great that you're enjoying the convenience of online shopping! Just remember to keep track of your orders and ensure you're within your budget.

If you need any further assistance or have questions about canceling your order, feel free to ask!
